sense.def:
To cure an illness
pomeni doseči, da bolezen mine.

seg.quote: There are few diseases that these modern drugs cannot cure.

sense.def:
To cure a sick or injured person
pomeni poskrbeti, da je bolna ali ranjena oseba spet zdrava.

seg.quote: Her patients appear to be cured.

sense.def:
To cure a problem
pomeni rešiti neki problem.

seg.quote: The bishop had done nothing to cure the widespread lack of faith.

sense.def:
To cure someone of a habit or attitude
pomeni doseči, da nekdo opusti neko navado ali način vedênja.

seg.quote: The shock of losing my purse cured me of my former carelessness.

sense.def:
Kadar je hrana, tobak ali živalska koža
cured
, jo obdelajo s sušenjem, prekajevanjem ali soljenjem, da se dolgo ohrani.

A cure
je zdravilo ali kakšna druga metoda, ki ozdravi bolezen.

seg.quote: There's no known cure for a cold.

sense.def:
A cure for a problem
je način, kako se uspešno lotimo problema.

seg.quote: The only cure for her unhappiness was to leave home.
